title: Bayesian spatio-temporal disease mapping of COVID-19 ...
summary: This blog post introduces a Spatio-temporal Poisson ANOVA model (SPAM) for Bayesian spatio-temporal disease mapping of COVID-19. It emphasizes the importance of spatio-temporal analysis in understanding disease dynamics and identifying patterns over time and across spatial units.
usefulness_reason: Score 90 assigned because the post explicitly mentions "Spatio-temporal Poisson ANOVA model" and "Spatio-temporal disease mapping," directly linking to "Spatio Temporal" and "Point Process" (Poisson process is a type of point process). This makes it highly relevant.
